p: Genistein is also known for its antioxidant activity. The mechanism consist of the upregulation of Nrf2 and HO-1, and activation of Akt [ 101]. In addition, genistein was reported to decrease the expression of a wide range of pro-inflammatory factors, such as COX2, IL-6, TNF-α, NF-κB, and IL-1ß [ 102].
